intro.p: This is the 90th issue of the Wine Weekly News publication. It's main goal is to distribute widely what's going on around Wine (the Un*x windows emulator).

section.title: Headlines
section.subject: News
section.p: For personal reasons (mainly current work load), I won't able to continue writing the Wine Weekly News.

All the Wine community is currently looking for someone to take the job over. If you're interested, let me know, I'll help for the switch (as the edition process is done, it would be possible to have several editors, so don't hesitate to drop me a note if you're interested).
I sincerly apologize to all the readers for the inconvenience and the delay for bringing you the latest news from the exciting Wine world.
